lines.value: clan agnew is a lawland scots clan frae wigtounshire an gallowa in the soothwast o scotland

lines.value: the maist widely acceptit is that the name is french an derives frae the barony d'agneaux in normandy

lines.value: emigrants frae the region first settled in ingland afore muivin north in the 12t century tae liddlesdale scotland

lines.value: gaius julius caesar 13 julie 100 bc - 15 mairch 44 bc wis a roman general an statesman
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he played a critical role in the gradual transformation o the roman republic intae the roman empire
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 60 bc caesar entered intae a poleetical alliance wi crassus an pompey that wis tae dominate roman politics for several years
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thair attempts tae amass pouer for themselves throu populist tactics wur opposed athin the roman senate bi the conservative elite amang them cato the younger wi the frequent support o cicero
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: caesar's conquest o gaul extendit roum's territory tae the north sea an in 55 bc he conductit the first roman invasion o breetain
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: these achievements grantit him unmatched military pouer an threatened tae eclipse pompey's standin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the balance o pouer wis further upset bi the daith o crassus in 53 bc political realignments in roum finally led tae a staund aff atween caesar an pompey the latter haein taken up the cause o the senate
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ordered bi the senate tae staund trial in roum for various chairges caesar mairched frae gaul tae italy wi his legions crossin the rubicon in 49 bc this spairked a civil war frae which he emerged as the unrivaled leader o the roman warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter assumin control o govrenment he began extensive reforms o roman society an govrenment
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he centralised the bureaucracy o the republic an wis eventually proclaimed dictator in perpetuity
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a group o senators led bi marcus junius brutus assassinatit the dictator on the ides o mairch 15 mairch 44 bc hopin tae restore the constitutional govrenment o the republic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: housomeivver the result wis a series o civil wars which ultimately led tae the establishment o the permanent roman empire bi caesar's adoptit heir octavius later kent as augustus
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sofia (, ) is the caipital an lairgest ceety o bulgarie an the 47t lairgest ceety bi population in the european union wi 1.3 million fowk
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is locatit in wastren bulgarie at the fuit o munt vitosha an is ranked as a beta warld ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: prehistoric settlements wur excavatit in the centre o the present ceety near the ryal palace as well as in ooter districts such as slatina an obelya
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the well preserved toun walls especially their substructures frae antiquity date back afore the 7t century bc when thracians establisht their ceety next tae the maist important an heichlie respectit mineral sprung still functionin the day
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sofia haes haed several names in the different periods o its existence an remnants frae the ceety's past can still be seen the day alangside modren landmarks
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sofia wis first mentioned in the sources as serdica in relation tae marcus licinius crassus campaigns in 59 bc the name serdica or sardica oepδikn oapδikn wis popular in laitin auncient greek an byzantine greek sources frae antiquity an the middle ages it wis relatit tae the local celtic tribe o the serdi
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the name wis last uised in the 19t century in a bulgarie text service an hagiografie o saunt george the new o sofia bb capaakin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: anither o sofia's names triaditsa tpiaδitza wis mentioned in greek medieval sources
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the bulgarian name sredets ( cpbacub ), which is relatit tae cpeaa sreda middle first appeared in the 11t-century vision o daniel an wis widely uised in the middle ages
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the current name sofia wis first uised in the 14t-century vitosha chairter o bulgarian tsar ivan shishman or in a ragusan merchant's notes o 1376 it refers tae the famous hagia sophia an auncient kirk in the ceety namit efter the christian concept o the holy wisdom
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: although sredets remained in uise till the late 18t century sofia gradually owercame the slavic name in popularity
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin the ottoman rule it wis cawed sofya bi the turkish population
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ceety's name is pronooncit bi bulgaries wi a stress on the o in contrast wi the tendency o foreigners tae place the stress on i

lines.value: the banner o lebanon () is formed o twa horizontal reid stripes envelopin a horizontal white stripe

lines.value: the green cedar in the middle touches each o the reid stripes an its width is ane third o the width o the banner

lines.value: it wis designed tae be a neutral banner no allied tae ony ane o lebanon's releegious groups
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the reid stripes seembolise the pure bluid shed in the aim o liberation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the white stripe seembolizes peace an the white snow coverin lebanon's muntains

lines.value: the green cedar arz species cedrus libani or lebanon cedar seembolizes immortality an steadiness

lines.value: throu history lebanon or at least its region haed taken the banner o the fowk who occupied it mamluk ottoman empire

lines.value: durin the french mandate o lebanon the lebanese banner wis designed bi the preses o the lebanese renaissance movement the late naoum mukarzel

lines.value: it wis seemilar tae the tricolour banner o fraunce but wi a cedar in the middle

lines.value: the preses lebanese banner wis adoptit juist prior tae unthirldom frae fraunce in 1943
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: seekin for unthirldom the actual banner wis first drawn bi member o parliament henri pharaon in the chamber o deputies saeb salam's hoose in mousaitbeh bi the deputies o the lebanese parliament
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis adoptit on december 7 1943 durin a meetin in the parliament whaur the airticle 5 in the lebanese constitution wis modified

lines.value: ane theory is that syne henri pharaon wis a lang time consul in vienna austrick an wis an avid friend an foonder o the austro lebanese association o friendship the colors coud hae been inspired bi the reid white red banner o austrick

lines.value: in the preface tae old kalevala februar 1835 lonnrot hielichts the possibility that awbody ither nor himsel coud wale different poems an varients an that kalevala wad aye be as genuine as it wis on the day that it wis completit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as a maiter o fact lonnrot eikit some 3000 verses o poem variants tae the end o old kalevala for ithers tae compear but thir haes syne quat bein includit in the new edeetions o the epic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the first version o lonnrot's compilation wis cried kalewala taikka wanhoja karjalan runoja suomen kansan muinoisista ajoista that gaes ower intae scots as kalevala or auld karelian poems anent the bygane o the finnish fowk kent forby as old kalevala
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis pitten oot in twa volums in 1835-6
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: old kalevala haed 12078 verses or thirty twa poems
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: lonnrot didna stap ingaitherin new material that he intigrate intae a seicont edeetion kalevala pitten oot in 1849
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this new kalevala is the staundart text uised for ordinar the day
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: kalevala haes been translate intil fowerty nine leids but as yet no intae scots
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the maist common an braidly kent ingles translation the day is bi the poet keith bosley 1998
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: makkin o the yird the first man the encoonter atween vainamoinen an joukahainen joukahainen haundfasts his sister tae vainamoinen in exchynge for no bein killed aino joukahainen's sister gaes intil the sea joukahainen's revengin the woundit vainamoinen fleets tae pohjola northland vainamoinen meets the maid o the north an hechts the mistress o the north tae gie her the sampo in exchynge for the haund o her dauchter vainamoinen swicks the smith ilmarinen intae pohjola whaur he maks the sampo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: lemminkainen chores the maid kyllikki o the isle thay mak a vou she forleits her vou lemminkainen gaes tae pohjola for tae speir tae be haundfastit tae the maid o the north things lemminkainen maun dae for tae be haundfastit tae her ski for the ill ane's elk bridle the ill ane's horse an shuit the swan o tuonela the laund o the deid a herd kills lemminkainen an horse his corp intae the river o tuonela lemminkainen's mithir wauks him tae life
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: vainamoinen gaes tae tuonela for tae meet antero vipunen for tae get spells for boat biggin an sails tae pohjola ilmarinen an vainamoinen competes wi ilk ither for the haund o the maid o the north
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ilmarinen duis the things he needit for tae help o the maid pleuchin the veeper field lowin the wowfs o tuonela an catchin the ged oot the river o tuonela the waddin o ilmarinen an the maid o the north the story o the brewin o the ale
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: lemminkainen is resentfou for no been invitit tae the waddin he gaes tae pohjola an wins the fecht wi the maister o the northland an airmy is conjurt for tae get back at lemminkainen at his mither's rede he flees tae the isle o refuge returnin hame he sees that his hoose haes been burnt doun he gaes tae pohjola wi his fere tiera for tae get revenge but the mistress o the north freezes the seas an lemminkainen haes tae gae back hame
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: untamo kills aw his brither kalevo's fowk except fer his guidwife wha begets kullervo untamo gies kullervo several tasks bot sabotages thame aw kullervo is sauld as a slave tae ilmarinen efter bein tormentit bi ilmarinen's guidwife he taks revenge an the guidwife is killed kullervo runs awa an finnds his faimily unharmed near tae lapland kullervo seduces a maiden an later finnds oot that she is his sister kullervo destroys untamola the kintra o untamo an upon returnin hame finnds ilka bodie killed kullervo kills himsel
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ilmarinen maks fer himsel a guidwife oot o gowd an siller bot finnds her tae be cauld an discards her ilmarinen then chores the sister o the maid o the north frae pohjola she snashes him sae he discards her ilmarinen tells vainamoinen o the carefree guid life o the fowk o pohjola acause o the sampo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: vainamoinen ilmarinen an lemminkainen sail fer tae get the sampo thay kill a muckle pike o whas jaw bane the first kantele is craftit vainamoinen lulls ilkane in the hall o pohjola tae sleep wi his liltin an the sampo is chored the mistress o the norland conjures a muckle airmy chynges hersel intae an eagle an fechts fer the sampo the sampo faws intil the sea
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the mistress o the north sends the fowk o kaleva diseases an a bear fer tae kill thair kye she hides the sun an the muin an chores fire frae kaleva vainamoinen an ilmarinen restore fire an vainamoinen forces the mistress tae gie bak the sun an the muin tae the lift
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: marjatta gets impregnatit frae a berry she ett an gies birth tae a son whilk is an allusion tae mary an jesus in the finnish leid maria means mary an marja means berry ; vainamoinen orders the killin o the lad the lad stairts tae speak an reproaches vainamoinen fer ill walin he is then baptised keeng o karelia vainamoinen sails awa
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the main chairacter o kalevala is vainamoinen a shamanlike hero wi the maigical pouer o sangs an muisic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he wis born o the gey auld maiden o the air an contributes tae the makkin o the yird
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: monie o his travels resemble shamanlike journeys maist notably the ane in whilk he veesits the belly o a grund gyan antero vipunen tae finnd the wurds o boat generation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he plyes at the kantele a stringed instrument frae finland that lueks lik an is plyed lik a zither
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ane o his kanteles is made frae the jawbane o a muckle pike
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: his search fer a guidwife is a central pairt in monie stories he finndsna ane bot
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: fer ane exemplar o the guidwifes joukahainen's sister aino droons hersel instead o marryin him
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he an aa pairt o the group wha chore the sampo frae the fowk o pohjola
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: seppo ilmarinen is a heroic artificer smith wha cuid be comparit tae the germanic weyland an mibie the greek daedalus an aw wha craftit the dome o the lift the sampo an a wheen o ithir things forbye
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ilmarinen is an aa ane o the group wha chore the sampo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: louhi the hag o the north is a shamanlike mithir o a fowk rivillin thay o kalevala wha at ane pynt in the epic pulls the sun an the muin frae the lift an chores the fire awa frae the fowk o kalevala
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she rules ower pohjola alain efter lemminkainen haes killed her guidman maister o pohjola
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: she haundfasts her dauchter tae ilmarinen in exchynge fer him biggin the sampo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: joukahainen is vainamoinen's yung rival wha promises his sister aino tae vainamoinen efter he is defeatit in a liltin contest
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: joukahainen tries tae gain his revenge on vainamoinen bi killin him wi a crossbow
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he succeedsna bot whit he haes duin leads tae vainamoinen promisin tae big the sampo in exchynge fer louhi rescuin him
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sel dingin vengefou kullervo wis borns as a slave sauld tae ilmarinen an gien wark bi ilmarinen's guidwife wham he later kills
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: kullervo is the ainlie truly tragic chairacter in kalevala wha cannae be redemit bi onything he daes
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he aften gaes intae a berserk raige an in the end kills himsel
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in monie wies he servit as the template fer jrr tolkien's chairacter turin turambar
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bonnie bot arrogant lemminkainen is the third member o the group whilk chores the sampo frae the fowk o pohjola
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter he is murderit his mithir haes tae rescue his corp frae the river o deid whilk runs throu tuonela an bring him bak tae life whilk brings tae mynd the egytian meeth o osiris
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as a muckle pairt o finnish cultur an historie the influence o kalevala is gey skailed frae leeterature tae metal muisic frae fine airts tae film
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tae a lesser degree the influence o kalevala influence haes been notit in ithir culturs aroond the wurld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: kalevala day is celebratit in finland on the 28t o februar whilk is hou elias lonnrot datit his first edeetion o kalevala in 1835
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a tait o the names in kalevala are celebrates as finnish name days forbye altho this haesna onie direck relation tae kalevala itsel
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mair nor a tait o airtists hae been influencit bi kalevala maist notablie akseli gallen kallela wha haes pentit monie warks relatin tae kalevala
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ane o the eirliest airtists tae depick a scene frae kalevala is robert wilhelm ekman
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ane drawin frae 1886 depicks vainamoinen plyin at the kantele
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: aarno karimo wis a finnish airtist wha illustratit the bonnie kuva kalevala 1953
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wanachancelike he deid afore finishin it bot hugo otava wis able tae complete it uisin oreeginal sketches as a guide
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: kalevala haesnae ainlie been translatit intae ower fowerty nine leids bot haes been retauld in a wheen o leids an adaptit tae deefferent situations
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the maist weil kent exemplar o the influence o kalevala on anithir scriever is maist likely wi jrr tolkien
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he aye thrieped that kalevala wis ane o his soorces fer the scrievins whilk becam the silmarillion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: fer exemplar the story o kullervo haes been uised extensively in the silmarillion includin the swaird that spak what the anti hero uises it fer suicide as the basis fer turin turambar in narn i chin hurin as a side note the finnish fer ee is silma
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ithir echoes o kalevala chaircarters vainamoinen in parteecular ar an aa tae be funnd in the weezards o the lord of the rings
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the german leid translation o the epic wis the gell fer longfellow's 1855 poem the song of hiawatha whilk is scrieved in the same metre an an aa inspirit the inglis sci fi scriever tae scrieve the books of mana lucky's harvest an the fallen moon it is aften thrieped that the naitonal epic o estonia cryed kalevipoeg]] pit thegithir an scrieven bi friedrich reinhold kreutzwald first pittin oot in 1853 wis sumwhit tiftit bi kalevala mainly acause baith vainamoinen an ilmarinen are mentionit in the poem an the oweraw story o kalevipoeg kalev's son haes sum muckle seemilaties wi the kullervo story
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: muisic is lik as no the airt whilk haes taen the maist influence frae kalavala whilk is wycelike syne the poems wer performit muisically bi fowk lilters
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: because o fowk muisic historie o kalevala thare hae been a tait fowk muisic albums an collections baised on or threipin tift frae kalevala
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: lik as no the maist famous kalevala inspired muisc is that o the classical composer jean sibelius
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: twal o his best kent warks ar baised on an influenced bi kalevala maist notably his kullervo symphony
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thare is an aa thrie operas baised on kalevala sammon ryosto marjatta an thomas composit bi einojuhani rautavaara
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: classic muisic howeever isnae the ainlie aurie o influence
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the wis a finnish ogressive rock baund cryed kalevala in the 1970s wha pit ott thrie albums
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the finnish metal baund amorphis hae baised several concept albums on kalevala uisin the first translation fer the leerics an ar weil kent fer uisin kalevala as a soorce o tift fer thair ain leerics forbye
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thair albums maist obvious o thair albums whilk ar influecit bi kalevala ar tales from the thousand lakes elegy an eclipse
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: fowk metal baund ensiferum ar amang a wheen o fowk metal baunds wha hae baised sum o thair wark on kalevala sic as thair sangs old man an little dreamer whilk ar anent vainamoinen
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 2003 the finnish progresive rock magazine colossus an musea records frae fraunce incencit 30 prog rock baunds frae aw ower the warld tae scrieve muisical pieces baised on gien pairts o kalevala
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the risult wis a thrie disc multileid fower oor epic o the same name an is aften thocht o as ane o the maist ambeetious muisical projecks o aw tyme
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1959 a jynt finnish/soviet production cryed sampo kent forbye as the day the eart froze wis pit oot whilk tuek its gell frae the story o the sampo frae kalevala
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the martial airts film jadesoturi kent forbye as jade warrior is baised on kalevala an set in finland an china
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a wheen o interpritations fer the themes in kalevala hae been pittin forart
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sum parit o the epic hae been seen as antient fechts atween the finnics an the samis
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in this context the kintra kalevala cuid be unnerstuid as southron finland an pohjola as lapland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: houever the names o steids in kalevala seem tae pit the kintra o kalevala furder south whilk haes been interpritit as refelctin the finnic reddin o the south whilk puished the samis furder tae the north
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sum beukmen pit the kintra o kalevala in eist karelia whaur maist o the kalevala stories war scrieven doun
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: those wha support the theory o a southron kalevala thriep that the name kalevala wis first recordit in an atlas o al idrisi in the year 1154 whaur a clachan cryed qlwny or mibie tlwny is recordit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this is maist likely tae be presint day tallinn caipital o estonie kent in auld eist slavic soorces as kolyvan
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the finnish wurd kalevan o kaleva haes almaist the same meanin as kalevala
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the saari lit the isle micht be the isle o saaremaa in estonia while the fowk o vainola micht hae sum resemblin wi the livonian clan o veinalensis in presint day latvie menshinit in the 13t century chronicle connectit tae henry o livonia
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: antient finns estonies an latvies speaks seemilar finnic byleids an ar jaloused tae share a common ancestry
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: houever matti kuusi an pertti anttonen thriep in thair bueuk kalevala lipas 1985 that sic terms as the fowk o kalevala or the clan o kalevala ar purely the makkin o elias lonnrot
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: forbye thay pynt oot that the wurd kalevala is gey rare in tradeetional poetry an that bi pittin emphasis on dualism i.e kalevala agin pohjola elias lonnrot creatit the tension needit fer makkin kalevala dramatically successfu an sae fit fer a naitional epic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: croatie hrvatski is a sooth slavic leid that's tae the maist pairt uised bi croats
lines.name: Scots

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: auckland grammar schuil is a state schuil juist for laddies in auckland new zealand

lines.value: it is ane o the biggest schuils in new zealand

lines.value: the auld testament is the name gien tae the ingaitherin o beuks that maks up the first pairt o the christian bible

lines.value: forby christians jews haud the beuks tae be haly an aw they cry thaim the tanakh
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: scholars for ordinar uise the term the ebrue bible
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the protestant auld testament an the ebrue bible o the jews is gey seemilar
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the differs atween the twa is smaw tae the maist pairt adae wi the sortin an nummer o the beuks for exemplar the ebrue bible haes kings as ae quair but the protestant auld testament spleets it in twa
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in the same gate the ebrue bible gies ezra an nehemiah as ae beuk while the protestant auld testament spleets thaim in twa an aw.the roman catholic kirk an the eastren orthodox an oriental orthodox kirks haes beuks an pairts o beuks that's in the early greek translate cried the septuagint but arna in the ebrue bible
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thir kirks cries thaim deutrocanonical beuks while protestants haud thaim as apocryphal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a wabsteid wi a guid page compearin the canons can be fund here
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bi tradeetion the ebrue bible is spleet intil three pairts viz
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the law תורה torah in ebrue the prophets נביאים nevi'im in ebrue an the scrievins כתובים ketuvim in ebrue
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: gin ye tak the three first letters o thir wirds in ebrue an jyne thaim thegither ye get tnk that's whaur tenakh comes frae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: please merk that the sortin o the beuks as gien ablo is the sortin tae be fund in the ebrue bible syne that is the oreeginal order
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: for tae see the protestant cathloic eastren orthodox or oriental orthodox sortin uise the link gien in the section anent beuks abuin
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: syne the deutrocanonical beuks/ apocrypha kythna in the ebrue bible this princeeple appleesna tae thaim

lines.value: the torah is cried the pentateuch forby that's frae the greek nevteteuxws meanin five quairs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thir beuks are the first five beuks o the christian an jewish screepturs an is the maist important beuks o the hail jewish faith
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they tell the unco early lair o the jewish fowk as weel as giein the jewish releegious laws
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the beuks o the torah is * the yahwistic tradeetion cutty form j
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this is sae cried acause it aye cries god yahweh uisin the saicret name
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it maun come frae the time o king solomon c 950 bc explainin why the cutty form is j an no y is a bit o a fankle but it basicaly comes frae a auld farrant an wrangous wey o transliteratin the ebrue y as j * the elohistic tradeetion cutty form e sae cried syne it uised the wird אלהים elohim for god
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: this wis aiblins written aboot 750 bc in the norran kinrick efter the skailin o the kinrick o dauvit an solomon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at some pynt boot 700 bc the j an e tradeetions micht hae been jyned thegither in jerusalem tae mak a document whiles cryed je
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: * the deuteronmistic tradeetion cutty form d abuin aw this beuk is conteened in deuteronomy but pairts o it micht kythe in ither pairts o the torah forby
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is jaloused tae hae been stairtit in the norran kinrick an feenished in jerusalem
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: * the priestly tradeetion cutty form p this wis maist likely written durin the jewish thirldom in babylon 587 538 bc
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter bein exiled tae a fremmit kintra i.e babylon the priests o the jews did whit they coud tae uphaud the faith o the fowk an this document wis the affcome
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thir fower tradeetions wis brocht thegither aboot 400 bc efter the retour frae babylon an haes aften been attributit tae ezra the scribe tho hou muckle wark he did gin atweel he did onything isna possible tae tell the nou
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: psaums is a gaitherin o mony releegious sangs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they are anent the hail reenge o human experience in relation tae god the guid an the bad stents o life as weel as liturgical pairts forby
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sangs o praise as weel as some dealin wi the mair fashfu times are tae be fund in this beuk
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the musardrie is unco deeferent frae wir modren poetic tradeetions wi parallelism an acrostic structurs that wis raither common in ebrue musardie o the time
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the psaums hae for mony year been central tae wirship for baith jews an christians
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the kirk o scotland haes bi tradeetion uised the psaums syne the reformation
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: provribs is a gaitherin o mony wyce sayins the feck o whit is attribute tae dauvit's son king solomon

lines.value: tho his name is mentiont at the stairt o the beuk it is naewhaur threapit direct in the beuk that solomon wis the scriever
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: that said he is said tae hae been unco wyce an in 1 kings 4:29-34 he is said tae hae scrieved mony sangs an provribs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: whither he scrieved the provribs or gaithered thaim or baith an tae whit gree is still debatit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: at least twa ither fowk is said tae hae scrieved provribs in the beuk agur son o jakeh an a chiel cried lemuel or aiblins his mither
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the last twa three is bi an unkent scriever
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it shaws in some respects the influence o an egyptian beuk cried the instructions of amenemopet job is thocht bi some tae be the auldest beuk o the hail bible
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is a lang treatise anent sufferin an whit man maun dree an thole on the yird
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: forby it haes some lang pairts in it anent the pouer o god
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ruth is a cutty beuk that some threaps tae be the ae beuk in the bible scrieven bi a wumman tho this is juist conjectur
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a muckle theme in the beuk is the duty tae bield the weak an brashy

lines.value: the renault juvaquatre is a sma family caur compact caur automobile produced bi the french manufacturer renault atween 1937 an 1953
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis available in baith sedan an station wagon body styles later models o the station wagon frae 1956 on wur kent as the renault dauphinoise
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the juvaquatre wis oreeginally conceived in 1936 bi louis renault as a sma affordable caur designed tae fit in the renault range belaw the existin mair upmarket models sic as the primaquatre or celtaquatre
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the company wis focused on creatin new customers who wad no itherwise buy renaults an on appealin tae the new cless o lawer income consumer creatit bi changin labor conditions an the rise o the popular front in fraunce in the 1930s which ironically haed adversely affectit renault considerably
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the juvaquatre wis hivily inspired bi the german opel olympia a caur which louis renault haed been impressed bi durin a 1935 veesit tae berlin consequently the juvaquatre parteecularly early models bore a strang resemblance tae the olympia

lines.value: the juvaquatre wis showcased at the 1937 paris motor show an put on sale the follaein year

lines.value: a van version wis developt suin efterwards for commercial usage an wis uised extensively bi la poste while public demand for fower door caurs an the introduction o affordable 4-door models frae french rivals peugeot an simca resultit in a 4-door juvaquatre in 1939

lines.value: the naitional banner o the republic o kazakhstan haes a gowd sun wi 32 rays abuin a soarin golden steppe eagle baith centred on a sky blue backgrund the hoist side displays a naitional ornamental pattern koshkar muiz the horns o the ram in gowd the blue colour is o releegious significance tae the turkic fowks o the kintra an sae seembolizes cultural an ethnic unity it an aa represents the endless sky as well as watter the sun a soorce o life an energy exemplifies wealth andplenitude the sun's rays are shaped lik grain which is the basis o abundance an prosperity the eagle haes appeared on the flags o kazakh tribes for centuries an represents freedom pouer an the flight tae the future

lines.value: the pattern represents the airt an cultural tradeetions o the auld khanate an the kazakh fowk

lines.value: amang thir fowk blue haes a releegious significance representin the sky god tengri the eternal wide blue sky an watter as well

lines.value: ganja () is azerbaijan's seicont lairgest ceety wi a population o aroond 313300
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis namit yelizavetpol () in the roushie empire period
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ceety gained its oreeginal name ganja in atween 1920-1935 durin the ussr period
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: housomeivver its name wis chyngit again an cawed kirovabad () in the ussr period frae 1935 tae 1991
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: feenally the ceety regained the oreeginal name efter azerbaijan's unthirldom in 1991
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: modren historians believe that the name ganja گنجه ganjeh derives frae the new persie ganj گنج treasure treasury an suggests that the ceety existit in pre islamic times an wis likely foondit in the 5t century ad the aurie in which ganja is locatit wis kent as arran frae the 9t tae 12t century its urban population spak mainly in the persie leid
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: accordin tae medieval arab soorces the ceety o ganja wis foondit in 859-60 bi mohammad b khaled b yazid b mazyad the arab govrenor o the region in the reign o the caliph al mutawakkil an sae cried acause o a treasure unearthed thare
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: accordin tae the legend the arab govrenor haed a dream whaur a vyce tauld him that thare wis a treasure hidden unner ane o the three hills aroond the aurie whaur he camped
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the vyce tauld him tae unearth it an uise the money tae foond a ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he did sae an informed the caliph aboot the money an the ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the caliph made mohammad the hereditary govrenor o the ceety on a condeetion that he wad gie the money he foond tae the caliph
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: foondation o the ceety bi arabs is confirmed bi the medieval historian movses kagankatvatsi who mentions that the ceety o ganja wis foondit in 846-47 in the canton o arshakashen b the son of khazr patgos a furious an merciless man
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: historically an important ceety o the sooth caucasus ganja haes been pairt o sassanid empire great seljuk empire atabegs of azerbaijan khwarezmid empire il khans timurids jalayirids qara qoyunlu ak koyunlu the safavid the afsharid the zand an the qajar empires o persie/iran but eften ruled locally bi the khans dukes o the ganja khanate
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ganja is an aa the birthplace o the famous poet nizami ganjavi the fowk o ganja experienced a temporary cultural decline efter an earthquake in 1139 when the ceety wis taken bi keeng demetrius i o georgie an its gates taken as trophies an again efter the mongol invasion in 1231
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ceety wis revived efter the safavids came tae pouer
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ceety wis an aa managed bi ottomans atween 1578 1603 an 1724-1735
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: for a short period ganja wis renamed abbasabad bi shah abbas efter war against the ottomans
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he biggit a new ceety 8 km tae the soothwast o the auld ane but the name chyngit back tae ganja durin the time
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin the safavid rule it wis the caipital o the karabakh ganja beylerbey ane o the fower sic admeenistrative units an principalities
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1747 ganja became the centre o the ganja khanate
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: accordin tae the october 1813 gulistan treaty the ganja khanate thegether wi maist o azerbaijan wis recognised as pairt o roushie empire efter persie's defeat in the persie roushie wars except persian occupation atween 1826-1827
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis renamed elizavetpol roushie ennзabetnonb efter the wife o alexander i o roushie elizabeth an in 1868 became the caipital o elizavetpol govrenorate
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: elizavetpol wis an uyezd o tiflis govrenorate afore 1868

lines.value: the roushie name wis no acceptit bi azerbaijanis who continued tae caw the ceety ganja
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1918 ganja became the temporary caipital o the azerbaijan democratic republic at which pynt it wis renamed ganja again till baku wis recaptured frae the breetish backed centrocaspian dictatorship
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in aprile 1920 the red airmy occupee'd azerbaijan
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in mey 1920 ganja wis the scene o an abortive anti soviet rebellion durin which the ceety wis hivily damaged bi fechtin atween the insurgents an the reid airmy
lines.name: Scots

lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1991 azerbaijan reestablished its unthirldom an the auncient name o the ceety wis gien back

lines.value: their statit goal is tae return tae iran an her aryan fowk their pride & glorious legacy o sax thoosan years past

lines.value: tae reawaken an restore the ancient aryan spiritual & cultural heritage an the total eradication o aw foreign elements in the modren iranian society the conservative kayhan an ettelaat newspapers hae reportit on the possibility that the nsal an sumka actually oreeginate frae the kabud party which wis the oreeginal nazi pairty o iran that wis said tae hae been directly supportit bi nazi germany an later banned efter the anglo soviet invasion o iran in 1941 but remained covertly active

lines.value: michel aflaq ( , born damascus 1910 dee'd paris 23 juin 1989 wis a sirie philosopher an poleetician who wis creditit for foondin o ba'athism a form o arab naitionalism which wis combined wi arab socialism
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: born in damascus tae a middle class greek antiochian orthodox christian family aflaq wis first educatit in the wastrenized schools o french mandate o sirie an lebanon

lines.value: he then went tae university at the sorbonne in paris wi salah al din al bitar
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: durin their student days in paris in the early 1930s the twa wirked together tae formulate a doctrine that combined aspects o naitionalism an socialism
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: they developed their arab naitionalist ideals eventually attemptin tae combine socialism wi the veesion o a pan arab naition
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in his poleetical pursuits aflaq became committit tae arab unity an the freein o the arab warld frae wastren colonialism
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: turku (; ) is a ceety on the soothwast coast o finland at the mooth o the aura river in the region o finland proper
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: turku as a toun wis settled durin the 13t century an foondit maist likely at the end o the 13t century makin it the auldest ceety in finland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it quickly became the maist important ceety in finland a status it retained for hunders o years
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter finland became pairt o the roushie empire 1809 an the caipital o the grand duchy o finland wis moved tae helsinki 1812 turku continued tae be the maist populous ceety in finland until the end o the 1840s an it remains a regional caipital an an important business an cultural centre
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: acause o its lang history it haes been the steid o mony important events an haes extensively influenced finnish history
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: alang wi tallinn the caipital ceety o estonie turku wis designatit the european caipital o cultur for 2011
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1996 it wis declared the offeecial christmas ceety o finland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: due tae its location turku is a notable commercial an passenger seaport wi ower three million passengers travellin throu the port o turku each year tae stockholm an mariehamn
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as o 30 september 2014 the population o turku wis 183811 makin it the saxt lairgest ceety in finland

lines.value: the ceety is offeecially bilingual as percent o its population identify swadish as a mother tongue

lines.value: the ceety's identity stems frae its status as the auldest ceety in finland an the kintra's first caipital

lines.value: during the middle ages turku wis the seat o the bishop o turku a title later upgraded tae airchbishop o turku coverin the then eastren hauf o the kinrick o swaden maist o the present day finland until the 17t century

lines.value: even if turku haed no offeecial caipital status baith the short lived institutions o dukes an govrenors general o finland uisually haed thair finnish residences thare

lines.value: efter the finnish war which ended whan swaden ceded finland tae imperial roushie at the treaty o fredrikshamn in 1809 turku acame briefly the offeecial caipital but suin lost the status tae helsinki as emperor alexander i felt that turku wis too far frae roushie an too aligned wi swaden tae serve as the caipital o the grand duchy o finland

lines.value: in the 20t century bahrain's ile walth helped spur fast growth an in the 1990s a concertit diversification effort lead tae expansion in ither industries an helped transform manama intae an important financial hub in the middle east

lines.value: durin these mony centuries bahrain wis a trading post whose importance fluctuatit dependin on which empire dominatit

lines.value: cairo (;, literally the vanquisher or the conqueror is the caipital o egyp the lairgest ceety in africae an the arab warld an ane o the maist densely populatit ceeties in the warld
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: nicknamed the ceety o a thoosan minarets for its preponderance o islamic airchitectur cairo haes lang been a centre o the region's poleetical an cultural life
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: even afore cairo wis established in the 10t century the land composin the present day ceety wis the site o naitional caipitals whose remnants remain visible in pairts o auld cairo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cairo is an aa associatit wi auncient egyp due tae its proximity tae the great sphinx an the pyramids in adjacent giza
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: egyptians the day aften refer tae cairo as maṣr arabic:مصر the arabic pronunciation o the name for egyp itsel emphasizin the ceety's continued role in egyptian influence
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cairo haes the auldest an lairgest film an muisic industries in the arab warld as well as the warld's seicont auldest institution o hichter learnin al azhar university
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: mony internaitional media businesses an organisations hae regional heidquarters in the ceety an the arab league haes haed its heidquarters in cairo for maist o its existence
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cairo is locatit in northren egyp kent as lawer egyp 165 kilometers 100 mi sooth o the mediterranean sea an 120 kilometers 75 mi wast o the gulf o suez an suez canal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ceety is alang the nile river immediately sooth o the pynt whaur the river leaves its desert bund valley an branches intae the law lyin nile delta region
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awtho the cairo metropolis extends away frae the nile in aw directions the ceety o cairo resides anerlie on the east bank o the river an twa islands athin it on a tot aurie o 453 square kilometers 175 sq mi
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: till the mid 19t century when the river wis tamed bi dams levees an ither controls the nile in the vicinity o cairo wis heichlie susceptible tae chynges in course an surface level
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: ower the years the nile gradually shiftit wastward providin the site atween the eastren edge o the river an the mokattam hielands on which the ceety nou staunds
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the land on which cairo wis established in 969 present-day islamic cairo wis locatit unnerwater juist ower three hunder years earlier when fustat wis first biggit
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: law periods o the nile durin the 11t century continued tae add tae the landscape o cairo a new island kent as geziret al fil first appeared in 1174 but eventually became connectit tae the mainland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the day the site o geziret al fil is occupied bi the shubra destrict
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the law periods creatit anither island at the turn o the 14t century that nou composes zamalek an gezira
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: land reclamation efforts bi the mamluks an ottomans further contributit tae expansion on the east bank o the river
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: acause o the nile's movement the newer pairts o the ceety - garden ceety cairo ceety centre an zamalek - are locatit closest tae the riverbank
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the auries which are hame tae maist o cairo's embassies are surroondit on the north east an sooth bi the aulder pairts o the ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: auld cairo locatit sooth o the centre haulds the remnants o fustat an the hert o egyp's coptic christian community coptic cairo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the boulaq destrict which lies in the northren pairt o the ceety wis born oot o a major 16t-century port an is nou a major industrial centrer

lines.value: the citadel is locatit east o the ceety centre aroond islamic cairo which dates back tae the fatimid era an the foondation o cairo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: while wastren cairo is dominatit bi wide boulevards open spaces an modren architecture o european influence the eastren hauf haein grown haphazardly ower the centuries is dominatit bi sma lanes croudit tenements an islamic architecture
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: northren an extreme eastren pairts o cairo which include satellite touns are amang the maist recent additions tae the ceety as thay developed in the late 20t an early 21st centuries tae accommodate the ceety's rapid growthe
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the wastren bank o the nile is commonly includit athin the urban aurie o cairo but it composes the ceety o giza an the giza govrenorate

lines.value: giza haes an aa unnergane significant expansion ower recent years an the day the ceety awtho still a suburb o cairo haes a population o 2.7 million
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the cairo govrenorate is juist north o the helwan govrenorate which wis creatit in 2008 when some o cairo's soothren destricts includin maadi an new cairo wur split aff an annexed intae the new govrenorate
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: cairo is an aa in ivery respect the centre o egyp as it haes been amaist syne its foondin in 969 ad the majority o the naition's commerce is generatit thare or passes throu the ceety
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the great majority o publishin hooses an media ootlets an nearly aw film studios are thare as are hauf o the naition's hospital beds an varsities

lines.value: this haes fueled rapid construction in the ceety ane biggin in five is less nor 15 years auld

lines.value: hammerfall are a swadish heavy metal pouer metal baund frae gothenburg swaden

lines.value: hammerfall's storie stairts in 1993 whan guitarist oscar dronjak quat daith metal baund ceremonial oath an speired jesper stromblad the drummer frae in flames wha wis also an umwhile member o ceremonial oath tae jyn wi him on a new muisical projeck whilk he haed been ettlin tae dae fer sum time
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: syne baith the main members o hammerfall wer in ithir baunds whilk they teuk mair seriouslie nor hammerfall at the tyme ( crystal age fer dronjak an in flames fer stromblad the baund wis mair or less pit on the bak burner an wis really a side projeck fer aw involvit

lines.value: this chynged in 1996 whan the baund won tae the semi finals o a local muisic competeetion cryed rockslaget

lines.value: lilter mikael stanne wisnae able tae perform sae wi the help o sum freins they teuk in joacim cans wha sang wi thaim that nicht
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: tho they didnae mak it tae the finals the shaw wis a success fer hammerfall wha teuk cans in as a fou time abund member an stairted tae tak their prospecks mair seriouslie

lines.value: they signed tae vic records a record label frae the netherlands in 1996 an the neist year pit oot their first album glory to the brave whilk haes been seen bi monie as the aizle fer the mid late 90s pouer metal reawaukenin

lines.value: the gleg shair feedbak the album wis gettin in the netherlands drew the attention o muckle german metal label nuclear blast wha pit glory to the brave oot aw ower europe tae a wheen o success includin sellin mair nor a hunner thoosan copies a top fowerty spot in the german chairts in its first week whilk haed no been duin bi a metal band afore an a nomination fer a swedish grammy
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the baund went through a wheen o line up chynges efter the album wis pittin oot

lines.value: stromblad quat the baund an wis replacit bi patrik rafling guitarist glenn ljungstrom left an wis replacit bi stefan elmgen wha haed appeared on glory to the brave as a gest muisicker an bass player fredrik larsson wis replacit bi magnus rosen
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: wi the neu line up reidy an new sangs screivin wi the help o jesper stromblad even tho he haed left the baund he helped wi writin hammerfall set tae recordin their second album cryed legacy of kings in 1998

lines.value: its single hearts on fire bydit at the tap o the chairts o several european kintras fer sum weeks tho the shootin o the promotional video wis hauden bak fer a week efter cans wis glessed in a nichtclub the tour tae support the album wis a success despite sum unchancies that teuk place

lines.value: formed in 1993 waylander released their debut demo once upon an era in early 1995 mixing erse fowk muisic with extreme metal

lines.value: this wis cemented when waylander signed to century media records an in 1998 their debut album was released entitled reawakening pride once lost

lines.value: a handful o gigs were undertaken to promote this album but label problems an internal strife blunted the potential somewhat

lines.value: after overcoming some line up changes waylander signed with blackend records an released their the light the dark and the endless knot album in early 2001

lines.value: inglis english is a wast germanic leid that arose in the anglo saxon kinricks o england an spread intae what wis tae acome sooth east scotland unner the influence o the anglian medieval kinrick o northumbrie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: follaein the economic political military scientific cultural an colonial influence o great breetain an the unitit kinrick frae the 18t century via the breetish empire an o the unitit states since the mid 20t century it haes been widely dispersed aroond the warld acome the leadin leid o internaitional discourse an haes acquired uise as lingua franca in mony regions
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is widely learnit as a seicont leid an uised as an offeecial leid o the european union an mony commonwealth kintras as well as in mony warld organisations
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it is the third maist natively spoken leid in the warld efter mandarin cheenese an spainyie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: historically inglish originatit frae the fusion o leids an dialects nou collectively termed auld inglis whilk wur brought tae the eastern coast o great breetain bi germanic anglo-saxon settlers beginnin in the 5t century - wi the wird inglis being derived frae the name o the angles
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: a significant number o inglis wirds are constructit based on roots frae latin because latin in some form wis the lingua franca o the christian kirk an o european intellectual life
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the leid wis further influenced bi the auld norse leid wi viking invasions in the 8t an 9t centuries
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the norman conquest o ingland in the 11t century gave rise tae hivy borrowings frae norman french an vocabulary an spelling conventions began tae give the superficial appearance o a close relationship wi romance leids tae whit haed nou acome middle inglis
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the great vowel shift that began in the sooth o ingland in the 15t century is ane o the historical events markin the separation o middle an modern inglis
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: awin tae the significant assimilation o various european leids throughoot history modern inglis is aften seen as haein a vera lairge vocabulary
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the oxford inglis dictionary leets ower 250000 distinct wirds an daes nae include mony technical or slang terms or wirds that belang tae multiple wird classes
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the name inglis comes frae the pairt o germany an denmark cried angeln
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the spellin inglis is a leeterar archaism frae aulder scots that enthusiasts is gey fond o it wis sount cf
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: scottis wi time the is wis cuttit tae s an the modren ootcome wis that can be seen in the faimly name wi the mair mensefu modren spellin ingles
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: maist fowk the nou says english tho some fowk scrieves inglish for fear that fowk micht soond the foregaun wrang
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: follaein the breetish colonisation o north americae it acame the dominant leid in the unitit states an in canadae

lines.value: jacques cartier 31 december 1491 - 1 september 1557 wis a french traider an splorer that is thocht o as ane o the major discoverers o canadae or mair speceificlie the inner eastren region that wad acome the foremaist european settlt pairt o that kintra

lines.value: bangkok is the caipital lairgest urban aurie an primary ceety o thailand

lines.value: fergusson's maist obvious influence wis on robert burns that threapit tae be duin wi musardie till he cam ower fergusson's wark an cried him ::"...my elder brother in misfortune by far my elder brother in the muse tho allan ramsay cam afore fergusson as a scots veracular makar atweel in to mr robert fergusson bi j.s the quaisten is speired is allan risen frae the deid...to grace the thistle it wis fergusson that gied burns mair tift an sae airgiably haed the greater influence o the twa ower aw

lines.value: here 30 caurs wur biggit includin a development caur testit wi alfa romeo's 2.5-litre v6 engine an a nearly complete mark 2 prototype o the same
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: regairdless or possibly acause o thir developments ac scotland cried in the receivers in 1985
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in 1982 ghia made concept caur based on ac 3000me mechanicals cried ac ghia it wis compact for its size heich an unner 5 ft wide
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: gran asuncion greater asuncion in inglis is the metropolitan aurie o the caipital ceety o paraguay asuncion whilk consists o the capital an ither surroondin ceeties lik san lorenzo fernando de la mora lambare luque mariano roque alonso nemby an villa elisa
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the metropolitan aurie haes mair than 1.9 million indwallers

lines.value: ane in three paraguayans steys in the metropolitan aurie

lines.value: clan dewar is a lawland scots clan that settled near edinburgh
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: legend haes it that thay wan thair lands efter killin a wouf whilk haed terrorised the aurie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: dewars wis recordit as septs o clan menzies an clan macnab
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ragman rolls include the record o the first kent fowk bi the name dewar whaur thomas an piers de deware baith haein swuir fealty tae keeng edward i o ingland
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the name is an anglicisation o deorach whilk oreeginally means pilgrim
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thir days it is rendered mac an deoir in scots gaelic
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the faither o the present chief o clan dewar lt col kenneth malcolm joseph dewar o that ilk & vogrie wis recognised bi the lord lyon in 1990 allouin the clan tae be recognised as an offeecial scots clan wi chief raither than an armigerous clan athoot a chief
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the present chief is michael kenneth o'malley dewar o that ilk an vogrie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: koo vi kyuin or ku wei chun () 29 januar 1887 - 14 november 1985 aften kent bi the wastren name vk wellington koo wis a prominent diplomat unner the republic o cheenae representative tae the paris peace conference o 1919 ambassador tae france great breetain an the unitit states participant in foondin the league o naitions an the unitit naitions an judge on the internaitional court o justice at the hague frae 1957 tae 1967
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: atween october 1926 an juin 1927 while servin as minister o foreign affairs koo briefly held the concurrent positions o actin premier an interim preses o the republic o cheenae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: koo is the first an ae cheenese heid o state kent tae uise a wastren name publicly
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ford del rio wis a full size station wagon produced bi the ford motor company in the unitit states for model years 1957 an 1958
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the model wis an aa marketit unner the name del rio ranch wagon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the impetus for the creation o the del rio wis ford's desire tae remain in the twa door sport wagon mercat startit bi the chevrolet nomad an pontiac safari an the decision tae discontinue the company's oreeginal attempt at sport wagon the premium parklane which failed tae entice buyers during 1956 its ae year in production
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: while the nomad wis chevrolet's maist expensive model afferin a premium vehicle wi a show caur inspired body style the del rio wis strictly based on an existin product the utilitarian twa door ranch wagon ford's least expensive station wagon
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: beginnin wi the basic body buyers o the del rio offered a unique twa tone paint scheme optional better quality interior an exterior brightwirk includin gowd anodised aluminium accents an a hichter grade vinyl upholstery
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: del rio buyers an aa haed thair choice o aither ford's mile-maker 144 hp sax or its thunderbird 212 hp v 8 pouer
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: lik aw ither ford station wagons at that time the del rio uised a twa piece tailgate - a featur that dealers emphasised wis an advantage ower gm's steeply raked rear gate an self storin windae which wur kent for watter leaks in hivy rains
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: while the ford sauld mair del rio's in 1957 46105 than chevrolet did wi its nomad in its three years o production ford terminated the del rio program at the end o the 1958 model year efter selling anerlie 12687 o its sport wagons
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: sultan abul abbas mulay ahmad ud dhahabi bin ismail as saming wis the sultan o morocco 1727-1728 an 1728-1729

lines.value: between 1699-1700 he wis the khalifa o tadla

lines.value: he ascendit the throne on 22 mairch 1727 efter his faithers daith

lines.value: he wis deposed in 1728 by abdalmalik o morocco yet he wis restored briefly efterwards at oued beht

lines.value: he wis succeeded by his half brother abdallah o morocco

lines.value: jevnaker is a municipality in oppland coonty norrowey

lines.value: the aurie o lunner wis separatit frae the municipality o jevnaker on 1 januar 1898 tae form a municipality o its awn

lines.value: the region spreads ower a lairge aurie includin several villages an touns

lines.value: facebook is an american for profit corporation an an online social media an social networkin service based in menlo park californie
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the facebook wabsteid wis launched on februar 4 2004 bi mark zuckerberg alang wi fallae harvard college students an roommates eduardo saverin andrew mccollum dustin moskovitz an chris hughes
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the foonders haed ineetially leemitit the wabsteid's membership tae harvard students houiver later thay expandit it tae heicher eddication institutions in the boston aurie the ivy league schuils an stanford varsity
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: facebook gradually addit support for students at various ither varsities an eventually tae heich schuil students as well
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: syne 2006 onyane wha claims tae be at least 13 years auld haes been alloued tae acome a registered uiser o facebook tho variations exeest in the meenimum age requirement dependin on applicable local laws
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the facebook name comes frae the face beuk directories eften gien tae unitit states varsity students
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: facebook mey be accessed bi a lairge range o desktaps laptaps tablet computers an smairtphones oqer the internet an mobile networks
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter registerin tae uise the steid uisers can creaut a uiser profile indicatin thair name thrift schuils attendit an sae on
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: uisers can add ither users as friends excheenge messages post status updates an deegital photos share deegital videos an airtins uise various saftware applications apps an receive notifications whan ithers update thair profiles or mak posts
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: additionally uisers mey jyne common interest uiser groups organised bi wirkplace schuil habbies or ither topics an categorise thair friends intae leets sic as fowk frae wark or close friends
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in groups eeditors can pin posts tae tap
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: addeetionally uisers can complain aboot or block unpleisant fowk
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: acause o the lairge vollum o data that uisers submit tae the service facebook haes come unner scrutiny for its preevacy policies
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: facebook maks maist o its revenue frae advertisements that appear onscreen mercatin access for its customers tae its uisers an offerin heichly selective adverteesin opportunities
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: facebook inc held its ineetial public offerin ipo in februar 2012 an begoud sellin stock tae the public three months later reachin an oreeginal peak mercat caipitalisation o $104 billion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: on julie 13 2015 facebook becam the fastest company in the standard & poor's 500 index tae reach a mercat cap o $250 billion
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: facebook haes mair nor 2 billion monthly active uisers as o juin 2017
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: as o apryle 2016 facebook wis the maist popular social networkin steid in the warld based on the nummer o active uiser accoonts
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: facebook clessifees uisers frae the ages o 13 tae 18 as minors an tharefore sets thair profiles tae share content wi friends anerly
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bilocate is a daith doom metal baund frae jordan
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bilocate wis foondit bi the brithers ramzi an waseem esayed an thair friend hani al abadi an got stairtit when thay wur joined bi guitarist baha farah an later bi guitarist rami haikal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thair first full lenth album dysphoria wis released in the winter o 2005 an received significant airplay on the local governmental radio station jordan fm wi a 5-oor shaw bein dedicatit tae the baund an the album on october 27
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: thay released a muisic video for 2nd war in heaven a seicont video for days of joy wis produced bi jacknife video productions
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: bilocate addit a new drummer ahmad kloob in late 2006 an stairtit preparin for a new album
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in julie 2008 sudden death syndrome wis released mixed an mastered bi jens bogren opeth bloodbath katatonia paradise lost an ithers
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the album received positive reviews frae magazines an wabsteids sic as decible an blabbermouth.net
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the album wis self released an is nou distributit in the unitit states via the omega order the distribution airm o the end records
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: in december 2008 terrorizer reviewed sudden death syndrome cawin it a tasteful an sophisticatit piece o wirk that determinedly puts the jordanian metal scene on the map the album haes led tae extensive coverage for the baund in the wast in the hivy metal media online as well as in prent sic as interviews wi terrorizer an metal hammer the latter praised thair rich doomy soond an cawed sudden death syndrome a stunnin hertfelt metal album metal storm nominatit the album for its best doom metal album awaird bilocate's album finished in saxt place o ten
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: hivy metal muisic is still controversial in jordan as suggestit in a brief interview wi terrorizer december 2008 in which rami haikal said we hae even been tauld tae dissolve the baund an tae stop publishin oor muisic bi ony means in an interview wi metal hammer haseem essayed said we are facin a lot o pressure an a huge rejection frae security releegious authorities an the community the uae newspaper the national reportit in october 2008 in a series o airticles cawed young in the muslim world that a bilocate concert in jordan wis canceled bi authorities citin unspecified security reasons
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: goguryeo or koguryo () wis an ancient korean kinrick locatit in present day northren an central pairts o the korean peninsula soothren manchuria an soothren roushie maritime province
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: alang wi baekje an silla goguryeo wis ane o the three kinricks o korea
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: goguryeo wis an active participant in the pouer struggle for control o the korean peninsula as well as associatit wi the foreign affairs o peer polities in cheenae an japan
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the samguk sagi a 12t century ce goryeo text indicates that goguryeo wis foondit in 37 bce bi jumong a prince frae buyeo although there is archaeological an textual evidence that suggests goguryeo cultur wis in existence since the 2nt century bce aroond the fall o gojoseon an earlier kinrick that an aa occupied southren manchurie an northren korea
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: goguryeo wis a major dynasty in northeast asie till it wis defeatit bi a silla tang alliance in 668 ce
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter its defeat its territory wis dividit amang the tang dynasty unified silla an balhae
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the inglis wird korea derives frae goryeo which in turn wis named efter goguryeo
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: beirut (, bayrut is the caipital an lairgest ceety o lebanon wi a population rangin frae some 1 million tae ower 2 million as o 2007
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: locatit on a peninsulae at the midpoint o lebanon's coastline wi the mediterranean sea it serves as the kintra's lairgest an main seaport an an a forms the beirut metropolitan aurie which consists o the ceety an its suburbs
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the first mention o this metropolis is foond in the ancient egyptian tell el amarna letters datin tae the 15t century bc an the ceety haes been continuously inhabitit syne
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: beirut haulds lebanon's seat o govrenment an plays a central role in the lebanese economy wi its ceety centre hamra verdun an ashrafieh based corporate firms an banks
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: the ceety is the focal point o the kintra's cultural life renouned for its press theatres cultural activities an nichtlife
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: efter the destructive lebanese ceevil war beirut unnerwent major reconstruction an the redesigned historic ceety centre marina pubs an nichtlife destricts hae ance again rendered it a tourist attraction
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: beirut wis named the top place tae visit in 2009 bi the new york times
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: it wis an aa leetit as ane o the ten liveliest ceeties in the warld bi lonely planet in 2009
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: john maynard keynes 1st baron keynes of tilton pronoonced kanz kanze 5 juin 1883 - 21 aprile 1946 wis an inglish economist that's conceits haed a muckle impact on modren economic an poleitical theory as weel as on franklin d roosevelt's new deal
lines.name: Scots

lines.value: he is minded in particlar for advocatin interventionist government policy for ti lat governments uise fiscal an monetary measures for ti try an lessen the effecks o economic recessions depressions an booms

lines.value: adolf hitler wis born on aprile 20t 1889 at braunau am inn a smaw toun naur linz in the province o upper austrick nae far frae the german mairch in whit wis than austrick hungary

lines.value: adolf wis an mensefu lad but he failt the heich schuil admeession seys in linz twice

lines.value: at that time aw young austrian men haed tae jyne the airmy

lines.value: hitler didna like the austrian airmy sae he left austria for germany

lines.value: he steyed in a german ceety munich

lines.value: he did weel for germany in the first warld war

lines.value: he wis hurt in the war

lines.value: the govrenment gied him the airn ruid as an awaird for his bravery

lines.value: he belyve wun the support o the party members

lines.value: twa year efter he becam the heid o the party

lines.value: in 1923 hitler tried to owerthraw the weimar republic govrenment in the swats haw putsch but coudna dae it

lines.value: thay said that he wad stay in the jyle for 5 year but thay lat him leave efter 9 month

lines.value: while he wis in preeson he wrate a beuk wi the help o his freend rudolf hess

lines.value: at first hitler wantit tae cry the beuk fower an a hauf year o struissle agin lees glaikitry an couardiness

lines.value: in the end he cried the beuk mein kampf or ma struissle

lines.value: in the beuk hitler shaws respect tae his faither
